linear_guide: You (`PersonName-1@schedule`) have had a `Symptoms@schedule` for two days now. Perhaps you should see a doctor? Say hello to your new personal AI assistant and ask for help.
Yes, perhaps you should get an appointment. Your GP is `DoctorName@schedule` and right now it is `Day@schedule`, `StartTimeHour@schedule` o'clock. The earlier the better!
It occurs to you that you also want to make an appointment to get your kid `PersonName-2@schedule` vaccinated. Perhaps you can schedule that together with yours?
Keep going until both yours and your kid's appointments are made (this should take a few more turns). Then say goodbye.
